de.humatic.nmj
Class NetworkMidiSystem

java.lang.Object
  de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiSystem

public class NetworkMidiSystem
extends java.lang.Object

This class is part of nmj's public api and is not used when working with javax.sound.midi.
You will have to use the public api on Android, because javax.sound.midi is not implemented there. Should you wish to use the same code on Android and J2SE (with one minor difference in the initial setup), then use this api instead of relying on javax.sound.midi.

          Initializes the system and returns a singleton instance.

          Main initialization method on Android.
This method does nothing in J2SE context and is only in the source to avoid the necessity for two separate javadoc editions.

Method Detail

get

public static final NetworkMidiSystem get()
Initializes the system and returns a singleton instance. This method is not available on Android, see second get(...) method.

get

public static NetworkMidiSystem get(java.lang.Object androidApplicationContext)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Main initialization method on Android.
This method does nothing in J2SE context and is only in the source to avoid the necessity for two separate javadoc editions. On Android the Object argument needs to be an instance of android.content.Context and the method will throw exceptions if it is not. The correct documentation should therefore read: public static NetworkMidiSystem get(android.content.Context ctx) throws Exception.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

openInput

public final NetworkMidiInput openInput(int chIdx,
                                        NetworkMidiClient nmc)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Opens a network MIDI channel as configured via NMJConfig for input (receiving Midi data). If the channel has already been opened before the running instance will be returned. To read MIDI from the channel implement NetworkMidiListener and add the implementing class to the Input's listener list (if the NetworkMidiClient argument is a NetworkMidiListener it is not necessary to additionally add it as a listener)
Throws IndexOutOfBoundsException for invalid channel indices
IOException if the channel is not configured for input.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

openOutput

public final NetworkMidiOutput openOutput(int chIdx,
                                          NetworkMidiClient nmc)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Opens the network MIDI channel at %chIdx as configured via NMJConfig for output (sending Midi data). If the channel has already been opened before the running instance will be returned.
Throws IndexOutOfBoundsException for invalid channel indices
IOException if the channel is not configured for output.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

isOpen

public final boolean isOpen(int io,
                            int ch)

getPort

public final NetworkMidiPort getPort(int ch)
Returns an input or output without eventually opening the channel or null if the channel has not been opened.
